snippet.title: Farewell North - Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
Play the Demo and Wishlist Farewell North on Steam 
👉 https://farewell-north.com/steam

Join the Discord
👉 https://farewell-north.com/discord

Restore color to the desolate islands of Farewell North, an open world journey where you play as a collie on an adventure with their human companion. Explore land and sea, uncover hidden paths, evade monsters, and free wildlife to bring color back to the world while revealing an emotional story about saying farewell.

Play the Farewell North demo on Steam now as part of the Steam Next Fest, a celebration of upcoming games, until February 28.

Trailer edited by Ian Mitchell
Original score by John Konsolakis, www.johnkonsolakis.eu

#gaming #demo #indiegames #nextfest
